ventingResponse: I felt angry because someone keeps rubbing doodoo all over my car door handles. I have no idea who the shit bandit is; but they are sick.  I have no idea what their problem is.  I have no enemies so I guess it must just be some bored kids.  Still it's nasty.

Basically my supervisor took over. He loved to make me feel really low. He loved showing his own agenda. At any chance he would belittle me. It made me feel really awkard. I almost complained on him it got so bad. In the end we became friends and he stopped doing it as much

I was angry when I ordered a pizza from a pizza place and they gave me the wrong pizza. I wanted the works and they gave me pepperoni. I was too hungry so I paid for it. It was pretty incompetent of the. I still gave the driver a tip though. It was pretty anger inducing.

I had a typical disagreement with a coworker. I thought we should do things one way because that's how I was trained. My coworker thought that he knew a better way. We would both be in trouble if we did not get it right. I did not want to get in trouble. I felt like we should just do the task as we were trained to do. This made me angry.

I had a roommate that smoked. I had quit and he he absolutely refused to smoke somewhere other than the main living area. He could have gone out the back door or in his room but noooo... he had to smoke in the living room. I finally decided to move but he moved out first.

I unexpectedly had to make out a schedule for an area of the store that was not normally mine; and asked the department manager for input and she thought she was too cool to help me.  Then later she complained to me bosses about the schedule I created.

My girlfriend was being so nice to me; she thanked me for all of the great things I was doing for her like buying her flowers; taking her out to dinner; treating her like a queen. She was just SO happy that I was doing so many generous things for her that she didn't get upset at all when I locked her keys in her car on accident. Like come on! Accidents happen...

I felt angry because I had no money. After the fight I was robbed. I did not have anything on me. I woke up at the bar in the morning and I was angry at myself for doing such a thing and getting drunk at the bar; It was a horrible experience. Never drink again; that is the key to avoiding this situation.

My girlfriend asks me to buy this special organic milk; and makes a big deal about it when I don't.  Not like I'm the one paying for it or anything.  Half the time it ends up spoiling because she doesn't even bother drinking it.  She sure is helping the environment.

My 5 year-old cousin was being the SWEETEST and most COOPERATIVE kid ever when he wouldn't stop throwing toys. It was really charming. Even though I didn't want to I was yelling at him; which just made him scream at me; it was really fun times all around.

I went into work one day and they had some issues with a computer out in the warehouse.  Of course it was that group that was having problems.  They blamed me for the issues because of an update I applied.  Because they know SO much about what I do.  I was angry and fixed the problem.  Wow; turns out it wasn't my fault who would have thought!

It was five months ago when my mother died. It had been a long time coming with her cancer but even still I wasn't ready for it. Of all the possible emotions to feel the one I felt the most and still can feel today is anger. I was angry that I couldn't have been there for her during her final hours; I was angry at the universe for relegating someone to such a horrible fate and I was angry at all the people that I thought would care - none of them seemed to at all. I was angry and alone but I guess that'll make my supervillain origin story all the more salient.

I was being very polite and this person decided to be a jerk out of nowhere. I guess they just didn't care for me at all because we never got along from the beginning. I have to work with this person on a daily basis; so that's always fun. I try to stay to myself when I can but every now and then they like to be rude and start a problem up with me.

I caught my father having an affair with a woman. I confronted him about this and eventually he agreed to stop seeing her.  Two weeks didn't even pass before he was seeing her again; and it was very obvious that he was.  I didn't know which to be more offended by: the notion that he thought I was so stupid that he wouldn't know he was seeing her again; or the idea that he knew; but just didn't care.  I felt betrayed and incredibly insulted.  I was furious.

I was so mad because my partners did not work on the project at the assigned time. I definitely could not work on it by myself so I was pretty mad that I had to work on it by myself and then they were upset that they didn't get a good grade on the project. Did they think that I could make magic happen with the project?

I assigned a programming task as part of a group project and when I checked back on the guy after a week he had made zero progress in the code. I ended up having to do it myself and settle for a sub-par user interface due to the lack of time. The project still did well but he felt like a dead weight.

A week after an outpatient surgery; my husband was helping to clean up the table after dinner.  My incisions had been irritating me all day; and I was uncomfortable.  I decided to help clean up the table anyway; because I felt bad letting him do it alone.  After I started to help; he went and sat down on the couch and left me to finish washing the dishes.  I was upset; and mad; because I was uncomfortable and standing to do the dishes was irritating.  I wanted him to offer to help; but instead he remained on the couch.

My brother was being a big jerk and arguing with me and the rest of the family.  I was all yeah right to his smart ass comments about the family business.  He was really not being nice and I wasn't being that nice either.  I remember him saying \what is wrong with you?\ and I replied \look in the mirror.\  It was not a pleasant argument and it ended with him storming off.  Things did not work out int he end at all.

Well; my mom just spent over 100;000 dollars of our savings. She said that she really wanted the best for us that is why she invested that a lot of money in a business. She's really a loving mother! I just felt happy because all the money allotted for her children's education is now gone. Great; right? Now; we have to suffer; I still support her... Not.

My roommate was speaking before a crowd of people. This was not easy becasuse she was using a foreign language. People that I know well that speak that language natively openly laughed at her and made her feel embarassed. This made me extremely anger. They try to speak my language but are not perfect and we do not laugh at them. I don't understand why they feel like it's okay for them to behave that way.

I loaned money to my Mom out the goodness of my heart and instead of paying me back she decided it was \owed\ to her for something else she had given me as a gift and refused to repay me. One would think that GIFTS would not later be subject to repayment; but maybe I am a giant Greedo.

Due to my son's habit of skipping homework and not putting on his non existent thinking cap when it comes to studying; he failed English. He now makes me put the taxi cab sign on my car to take him back and forth to summer school; when this should be time for me to hang out and have fun with my other kids. There goes my gas money and time.

I was tricked by a friend into thinking she had feelings for me when she didn't. I was very mad about the whole situation. She told me she loved me and not even a week later told me she didn't really love me. I would never want to experience that again.

I was pregnant; and I was waiting until 12 weeks to tell a close friend that I was pregnant with twins.  He knew we had fertility struggles; but when I told him (at 12 weeks) he didn't act happy at all.  He acted like a child; sulking in the corner and not acting happy for me at all.  I was furious and didn't talk to him for a couple weeks.

I tried to communicate with my parents on a visit home. Bad idea. Nothing but complaints about their cushy life. Nothing but talking about themselves. Nothing I could do was right. I'd say it was like talking to a wall; but walls aren't generally offensive while they're ignoring you.

My brother got into a car accident with my car when he was 17. I was 18 and had just gotten the car and he was jealous. He decided to take my car without my knowing about it and go for a joyride in it. About the time I figured out my car was gone I got a phone call from him saying he had gotten it into an accident. He totaled my car. I was angry for a long time about that.

My sister; who isn't too bright; decided she wanted a better grade in English. She knew I was the better writer; so she stole my paper for another class and submitted it as her own. So not cool; but hey; it's her. Her moral compass is less than a tiger's.

So many times I've been there for this girl when she was coming off drugs. I felt like I could guide her into being a \good\ mom. She invited me and my family to her daughter's 5th birthday party which was going to be 1 week from the day she \cleaned up\ and stopped using. When we got to the party she was wandering around the place so lost and confused. She hadn't got any food started; so I helped with that; and got some of the decorations hung. I couldn't believe that she couldn't at the very least stay straight for the party. It was an embarrassment. She was so high she forgot to even do the pinata until everyone had left. I was so angry with her I didn't talk to her for at least a month.

someone hit my car and then drove away. I'd just bought it and I worked so hard to earn the money. My insurance deductible was high and I didn't want my rates to go up. No matter waht; the outcome was bad for me. It was so unfair!! I felt anger and disgust and I was just sick and furious about it.

Me and my brothers good friend; who we thought of almost like another brother (thought; past tense of course); blew up at my brother for something that my brother had no idea would set our friend off like that; as if he was supposed to be some kind of mind reader.\n\nMy brother meant well; not that you'd think it from how our friend reacted; and was actually trying to seek out a friendly face. That turned our real well. Our friend had been undergoing a lot of stress lately; sure. That's a good excuse for treating a close friend like trash; right?

Several years back my sisters lived with my mom and stepdad.  My stepdad is generally a nice guy but for whatever reason one day he snapped.  My sister was arguing with him and they started shouting.  He then hit her in the face and caused her to bleed.  When I heard about it it pissed me off and wanted to kill him but the whole family sat down and discussed it and he went to counseling and he hasn't done anything like it since then.

My wife always tells me to do things with my baby multiple times.  Last night; for instance; I was getting him out of the car and she kept telling me how to do it properly.  I finally told her that I got it and stormed off.  She didn't like my response and kept hammering the point home.  I then told her I got it again and she started to cry.  I realized that she wasn't going to leave me alone about this; so I sucked it up and pretended to listen to her lecture.

I asked my girlfriend to borrow money one day to open a bank account. She said it was okay as long as I signed a contract saying I would pay her back. She comes from a history of abusive boyfriends; and just a troubling history. I come from a history of making good money; and there was never an instance where I needed to borrow money. I made a big move from California to Louisiana; so the days of making 55;000-60;000 are gone and old at the moment. No one knows me here. Back to the point. I found it really offensive as I never had anyone... not trust me in regards to money like that before. Contracts sound like something a stranger would ask of you.

I told my brother i wanted to go into a new work field. he laughed at me and told me that going into a nurse profession is girlie. I told him it would be something i was good at. He started laughing and made fun of me. He made me feel regret for even telling him. i wish he was more supportive.

My Mom asked me for $10 one day last summer. I told her to take my debit card and just get it out because I didn't have any cash on me. She ended up withdrawing all of the money I had saved. I was so glad she did that. It wasn't like I needed that money to pay for school; my car; and all of my other bills. I didn't find out she did it until a few days later; and then I exploded...with joy.

My Mother got and I got into a debate about my friends and how she doesn't like any of them.  Ironically she doesn't have any friends herself; so I'm unsure as to why she feels the need to disparage mine.  She says they all weird.  If she only knew how \weird\ they were; she would really be upset.

My friend was relying on me to take him to work and I got tired of it. He would not help pay for gas or do anything to help me. I got tired of it and told him to either pay up or find another ride. He got angry with me and acted like I was obligated to take him.  I broke off the friendship after that and will not do it again.

My ex-best friend is the one who made me angry. I was invited to her wedding; but had a weird feeling she didn't want me there. I told her that my husband couldn't come to the wedding (we had moved 800 miles away) and asked if I could bring my mom (whom she knew very well). She ignored me for two weeks; then sent a text message saying no. I was so stunned and knew she just didn't want me there at all.

My stupid co worker claimed that the project we worked on was his whole idea. I can't believe he would do that and take all the credit. He is probably trying to make up for his shortcomings. I wish he wouldn't have made it look like I did nothing. We worked on it together and him saying he did it himself makes me so angry. I hope he loses his job.

My sister started criticizing my relationship. She said she felt bad for my boyfriend for having to be with me. She was yelling and screaming. She called me a bitch. I felt terrible and ran off crying because what she said hurt me. We didn't talk for about two days afterwards.

I was harmed by a brother of mine. He was addicted to gambling; but I didn't know it at the time; he hid it from the family. He asked me a for a sizable \loan\; saying that it was to help him play his student loans while he was in school and looking for a job. Being the brother that I am; I obliged. This was a big loan; so I had to delay my engagement to my girlfriend by a few months; but he was my brother and was in need; I couldn't just turn him away. Once I found out what the money I loaned him was really for; I became furious. The trust between him and I was broken. I can never take his word at face value ever again.

When I was in high school there was a school event that we were all looking forward to participating in. About a week prior to the even I was caught drinking beer by my dad.  He and my mom grounded me for two weeks.  This included the school event time period so I could not go. I was livid and thought at the time the punishment was very unfair

I had started to make plans to visit some family.  Because the trip is long and not pleasant I was hoping that I would be accepted but instead personal agendas were more important and I ended up not going and upset some of my other family members.  I am feeling reluctant to reschedule.

Basically; it all comes down to some passive aggressive garbage a former boss wrote in; an employee review.  Every good score was laced with a venomous comment; just to bring me down a peg or two.  It was totally unneccessary and truly pissed me off for a long while.

This highly-intelligent; highly-qualified; impersonally competent; highly-regarded with incredible business acumen; gave me constant constructive feedback about my work; you know; for the client. For an entire year. I mean she was clearly adding value to my product and thus the company; and every other person from peer reviewers to other people in her position rarely ever had critical reviews of my work. Clearly they were all just terrible at their jobs. Clearly. I can't believe the place is still in business. They are lucky to be in the presence of such godliness.

Oh yeah; I'll move those packages. Is that good? Have I satisfied your need for control over another human being? I'm sorry that you were never taught how to deal with other people and that you're so insecure. With your slicked back haircut. And your inability to comprehend time.

I asked my sister to not unbuckle my daughter for any reason in her van and she gave her permission to do it.  I was so upset that I did not talk to her the rest of the trip.  She did not think anything was wrong.  Can you believe that?  How stupid can you be?

My brother ended up getting angry at me and not talking to me anymore because I told my mother off. I am 13 years older than my brother and he fully doesn't understand what happened. I tried to tell him; but he stuck up for her and always would. So he wrote me a message on Facebook; cussing me out and told me to stay out of this life. It made me angry and saddened me because I was there for him growing up. I raised him and did everything for him while my mother wasn't around. I couldn't believe he could treat me like that.

Well I was cooking for my parents because they asked me to. And I was boiling some mashed potatoes and cooking meat on low heat. I go to my room for a few minutes and I come back to my dad raising the heat on high and cutting in to the meat and letting all the juice escape. He said the meat wasn't cooked even though I knew what I was doing and he was a drunk and being belligerant.

Recently on the fourth of July I got into a fight with my mother; and we shouted at each other. I was angry because she was being rude to me; and previously had been rude to my guest. Family gatherings tend to make me more emotional. After we shouted at each other we had to get away from each other for a little while; but things have calmed down since.

I was offered a job that pays $275 for about 35 hours of work. The job was a gig to play violin in the pit of a local production of the musical 'Into the Woods.' Since I don't own a car and I live with my parents; I had to get their permission to use the car. They kept coming up with random excuses as to why I should not accept the job. They told me that $275 was not worth the effort; even though I was the one making that effort and I was the only one capable to make that decision. This made me angry because they were depriving me of a chance to earn money for myself and also because they were trying to tell me what amount of effort was worth it to me; when I'm the one best suited to decide that.

My wife and I got into a pretty big argument over the weekend. The gist of it is that my brother is going to be moving in with us for a bit (right around the time that we're expecting to have our 2nd kid); and my wife had some concerns about my brother's cleanliness. I thought she was overreacting a little bit; but she wouldn't let it go. She got upset with me for getting upset; and we went around like that for a while.

i felt angry because the guy i love didnt care about me as much as i cared about him. i felt really bad about it and it didnt make him feel good deep down inside either. it made me very upset and i had just had to tell my parents about it. i hated the fact that it happened and i wish it never happened again

my boyfriend cheated on me and I found out about it by the other woman. I was very angry and confronted my boyfriend; who lied about it.I broke up with him and moved on with my life; I was heartbroken for several months. He eventually ended up dating the woman he cheated on me and he cheated on her too.

My wife told me I needed to more careful what I said around her friends. She said I was rude. I couldn't see how I was rude at all. In fact; I am careful to always be considerate. This made me mad and bothered for a while; because I couldn't see any reason she would feel I am like that.

My spouse and I were having a disagreement. The water company came to connect our water at our house; but they wouldn't leave it if something was running. Well we were home when they claimed to have come and didn't turn it on or anything. I had to call the next morning to have them send a tech to our house. They said they would add $10 on the next month's bill. I wasn't pissed about the money but that while I was talking to the dumb bitch on the phone; my spouse is yelling at me. Like I can hear him and her. What the fuck!!! Anyway. I'm done with that before I get pissed again.

My friend invited me over for dinner. Right before I was ready to leave for her house I got a text message from her. She told me she would leave her car for me and some extra money if I'd feed her kids and babysit them for the night. She wanted to spend the night at her boyfriend's house. So; she completely bailed on the evening we had planned.

When my alcoholic father came home one night in a drunken rage; he destroyed most of his possessions.  This affected me as well because he destroyed some of my things.  That makes a lot of sense; destroying things needlessly.  Maybe he felt that someone else should suffer as he did?

My sister was being very disrespectful to our family and was being condescending to all of us.  We had a big fight and I lost my temper a little bit.  She said a few words that kind of lit the fuse and we had to be separated by my other family members.  We're doing ok now but that was a frightening incident.

I was once ignored by someone when asking them if we could collaborate on a homework assignment together. Later that night; I found out that they had decided to work with someone else instead; choosing to ignore me rather than talk to me honestly. I felt very embarrassed and hurt at the event; as well as anger for having wanted to help the other person.

I got married two years ago. After 20 years of friendship and untold hours on the phone; my best friend couldn't come to my wedding. That's actually not true. She just didn't want to come. She didn't want to get on a plane.  All the things that I had done for her over the years didn't seem to matter.. She was jealous and felt bD about herself and refused to come.

I got really annoyed at this kid while we were at a high school band trip together. I was already irritated and he angered me even more. He was almost purposely provoking me and it caused me to get more angry. I ended up punching him in the face. I was that angry that I risked getting in trouble.

I was going to meet her for dinner and she texted me a really long time before hand to let me know she would be late; all of 2 minutes before we were supposed to meet; so that is perfectly understandable; right? She then made me wait at the restaurant for the next 30 minutes; because my time isn't worth anything to her. Finally she showed up like nothing was wrong.

A \friend\ of mine who I have known for 20 years that I knew is basically a prick had taken advantage of me on several occasions. Offering me to do side jobs with him and then attempting to pay me little for my work. Then the last couple side jobs I did with him; he just never payed me in full. I also I had lent him $100 with my tax return that he assured I would get the following Friday and here we are 3 plus years later and I've yet to see that money. The only time he seems to call is when he needs a favor and not to mention he screwed my mom over on some side work he did for her. I texted this guy a few weeks back and told him to keep the money he owes me and to stick it where the sun don't shine.

I was told to find a job and make \good use\ of my time; as if finding a job is that easy. They thought \oh just apply and you'll reply\ thinking that 1 day is enough time for them to take in applications. As if companies check applications the moment they come in.

It was the time I was lead of a project and had to be assertive on action items being completed by the team. I had to be very clear and concise on what people had to do and when. The project went well thanks to me being very assertive to meet deadlines but a fellow employee made me mad because she didn't want to do her action items.

One of my friends wanted to golf on my team in a golf scramble.  He literally told me he couldn't so I asked someone else.  A few weeks later he told me he could and assumed he was going to play with us.  I told him he couldn't because I asked someone else.  He got upset at me for that.  I got upset because he was being very unreasonable.

My husband always forgets what he promises to do. He will say he will take care of something then it will go undone for weeks. When I finally get around to doing it he gets upset as if he was going to do it. It pisses me off because this happened the other night with unloading the dishwasher. It's not that hard. I was so mad because he promised he would do it and I don't want to nag but damn I need some dishes to use!

He sure was a good friend. He even left me his dead car in my driveway for 6 whole months. What a swell guy; leaving all that stuff in his old bedroom for me to go through and clean up. I hope this guy has a great life with all that money from that month of rent he never paid me!

Because he made some bad jokes. I really font like to taste these kind of jokes but yeea i'm his best friend of course. And I love your jokes so much that i can count on you. Really? How to tell him that this thing disturb me very much? hmm i dont know really

My ex-wife decided to tell my father that I had a gambling problem; though I had been to a casino only one time with some friends.  She was trying to make me look bad in the eyes of both my family and the divorce judge; though she was having an affair with her boss.  My father bought her lies; and my relationship with him was ruined for the next decade plus.

I had come to visit my parents for the weekend because I live 5 hours away. I dont get along with my father and I get really uncomfortable when he is around my daughter. This time he carried her without my permission failed to tell me he had a cold and 2 days after my daughter had a cold too. It was her first cold so I was angry at him.

I coworker got angry because he thought I had screwed up something. I tried explaining what happened and how it wasn't my fault but he kept talking over me and interrupting. It was very annoying not being able to explain the actual issue and instead just dealing with someone being rude and impatient.

I remember a time when I was trying to decide whether or not to take a job that was across country.  It would be a great boost to my career in terms of pay; prestige; and influence within the company that I was working in; however I hesitated because it would mean having to move away from my friends and family that I so much loved and cared for.  My mother; bless her heart; was TRYING to be supportive of me during this time that I was trying to decide what to do; but in her way; she was being a BIT selfish in trying to; subtlety; steer me towards not pursuing the course of action and staying in my old position; (ie. subtle in that she never came right out and SAID I shouldn't take it; but would offer support but then also give a bit of a back-hand comment on the idea of moving; \oh it would be so hard to move that far away\ or \wow; that would be a ton of extra responsibility\)  In her way; she was TRYING to help me; but in doing so; was becoming more of a distraction then an actual support.  I know my mom cares about me deeply; and wanted me to do whatever I felt was right; but I really didn't need that type of distraction at that point in time.

I was at work; this event happened a few days ago. I am new at my job and at this point I had not yet learned how to to some things that I have now. So the manager had me working on cleaning and organizing stuff. I had a question for her so I went into her office. As I was starting to ask her the question she interupted me and told me off about something trivial; it was kind of upsetting and rude.

My husband and I had a date planned; mind you it was a stay at home date. With two kids under two and no babysitter; all of our dates are at home once the kids are in bed. We were going to make popcorn and watch a relatively new movie. Nothing fancy; really; but that point is that we had plans together. Earlier that day; we were shopping for groceries; and he ran into one of his colleagues. The colleague then proceeded to beg him to come over that night to play darts and drink a few beers. I told him that would be fine as long as he wasn't there very long so we could still have our date. Lo and behold! He was gone for almost three hours and did not come home until almost 10 o'clock! When he arrived home I was getting ready for bed; obviously pissed off like no ones business! How could he blow me off like that? I was incredibly offended that he would treat me like I didn't matter and that I would wait up for him. I'm stuck in the middle of nowhere with no family near by because of HIS career; and he expects me to be okay with that behavior? Nope! He was in the dog house that night.

The last time I had work at Dominos pizza I delivered pizzas for about 5 hours of work. In total I made about half of what I usually make in about 3 hours of work. Throughout the day I was confused about why I kept getting stiffed but by the end of the day when I found out how much I made in total I was both angry and disappointed.

It was just wonderful; my best \friend\ completely lied to me. It was stupid internet drama; where this friend of mine created a fake online profile to harass some of our other mutual friends. At that time no one knew who it was; though I suspected him because of the typing style. He said it wasn't him and since of course my amazing best friend wouldn't lie I believed him. That is; until I caught him red handed. We stopped being friends after that.

After waking up especially early to carry a couch out to the truck of a person was buying it; I was promptly yelled at for not carrying it fast enough. This made me angry because I went out of my way to help out the person who could move the couch themselves.

I  was at a bar with a lot of my friends and my girlfriend when one of my friends tried to kiss her (against her will). I got mad; uncontrollably mad; and I pushed my friend over the table punched him as he stumbled. I felt bad for a week about until he apologized. I still wish I hadn't hit him

I went out drinking with a friend of mine and I had on these pants with short pockets. I knew drinking hard liquor and wearing these pants would be bad because I'm constantly losing things. I told my friend to let me change; but being in a rush to get no where is his forte. I didn't change because I'm a genius and listening to other geniuses is my niche. I end up drinking and losing my wallet with my world in it. No problem. I just lost all of my money; my new drivers license; AAA card; and health care card. who needs that stuff.

I was driving in my car yesterday and this jackass cut me off. Now; I know it seems like something really small; but it was upsetting-- specially in LA traffic. So this guy cuts me off; and I make a face at him and he proceeds to FLIP ME OFF; for failing to put down rose petals for his arrival. It drove me nuts because he was clearly in the wrong; but he felt the need to be rude on top of already being rude.\n

I had some putz in the left turn lane one day while I was following my mother in my brothers truck.  We were both waiting on a light and he honked his horn to get my attention while his pitch flicked me off.  She had a pretty finger but I was not amused.  The light turned green; my mother continued straight; the punk turned left and I turned left and went after them.  I ran them off the road into a steep ditch; parked my brothers 4x4 in the ditch; got out and proceeded to express my dissatisfaction with their behavior.  The must not have understood me because; all they did was look forward and pretend I wasn't there.  I was satisfied; however and I put the truck in 4x mode and left the ditch to find my mother.  I have no idea how they got their little car out of the ditch.  I am pretty sure that is the maddest I have ever been.

Thinking about a time I was angry.  I have been in a long distance relationship for almost 5 year.  My boyfriend just doesn't have time for me and I am sick of being lonely.  I tell him how I feel; and he completely dismisses my feelings as if they are not authentic and genuine!  How can he do that!  I need his attention; I cannot go on not being a priority to him.  I need more emotionally.  I don't think this will work.

someone does something for you out of kindness you should be grateful even if it isn't exactly what you wanted its better than nothing. my mother surpirised my sister with a  new mattress but it wasn't the one she wanted so she was angry. I couldn't sleep thinking about how bratty she was acting.

I was angry at a coworker for not doing his job on the shift prior to mine. He is an extremely efficient worker who can always be counted on to do an excellent job and exceed expectations. I look forward to working after he has been on for the day. He should get a promotion for sure.

My friend likes to make bad jokes even if he is a good friend; does he think i love his bad jokes that much? yes; i love them so much. You can imagine; how much but i cant say him directly .if he will continue this way; i will definetly going to tell him.

When I had found out my ex wife was dating somebody on the internet.I was absolutley furious. I really never remember a time in my life when I was even close to being that angry. I had feelings of doing things that I thought I wasnt even capable of. It has litarly taken me almost 10 years to get over the anger and sometimes when i think about it it still ticks me off.

My co-manager at the store I worked at didn't like me at all; so he organized all of the other workers together and had them give me the silent treatment. It's not easy to manage people who won't talk to you. I was livid. I couldn't believe a 45-year-old man could be so petty. I tried to talk to him about it; but he pretended like nothing was wrong. Then he went to the owner of the company behind my back and complained about my job performance; despite my performance being exemplary. He wanted me out; plain and simple. I couldn't sleep well that summer.

My boss Gary required that all events that took place of graveyard shift be dictated word for word in the daily log. Somehow by every single thing this jackass said being taken down word for word; he becomes competent and useful instead of the suit filler that he was. I got behind one night; and this idiot dictated a fucking phone number on a vending machine. I 10-9ed him. He said (irritated) he would have to go back. 30 minutes behind; I could've killed him.

My boyfriend recently tried to get some boxes of stuff from his ex wife. These boxes contain items from his childhood. She essentially told him she needed more notice and blew him off. This happens every time he tries to pick them up and has been going on for months and months. it made me very upset for him becuase he just wants to get it over with so we never have to talk to this woman again.

This past weekend my parents hosted a family dinner for about 10 of us. Everyone brought food or drink but my brother thought it sufficient to bring his total lack of sobriety. He showed up drunk and really entertained the group with his belligerence and anger.  The children present got a wonderful glimpse of what happens when perpetual unemployment meets alcoholism. It was a marvelous time.

I was trying to get my life together. I was right out of highschool. I was doing all the things I needed too so that I could successfully prepare for my future. But my mom and her husband kicked me out of their house. I immediately lost all hope of getting my future schooling/finances in shape.

Well; obviously; this one time I was walking with my friend to go to the store to get us something to drink on. Then this man; probably about 8 foot tall; came up on us and tried to rob us. I told him to back up and get away from me before something bad happens. He ended up running away just as a police car was driving by and I ended up getting questioned by the cop like I was the criminal.

This man would not let me speak.  We started on a relation to college studies and then he told me somethings about his life.  I followed back with some things about my life.  Then he stole the conversation and just begin to talk about himself and I got so annoyed and angry that I had to leave.

One of my best friends liked a girl that I was seeing; and decided that he wanted to put a stop to it. So he got to talking in her ear; telling her lies about me; and she eventually decided to call it quits. A year later he starts dating her and now they live together.

My ex-husband was stationed overseas. I was pregnant with our first child and waiting to get housing where he was stationed. It was taking much longer than it should have. I found out that he hadn't submitted the paperwork to get housing for months. And I found out that he was cheating on me with his friend's wife.

I was having a bad week because of some major tooth pain; and a one time close friend sent me an email basically calling me out for being a flake.  I had recently lost my car; and was living in a no party environment; so she had some good points.  Instead of having a conversation; I got angry and defensive.  I sent her a nasty email to which her response was \yuck; I'm not dealing with this anymore\.  I calmed down later; but we haven't talked in 3 years since the incident.

I needed my brother to come home early to help me with something we both needed to get done. It was to move around furniture and clean up before some guests showed up the next day. He showed up hours late; late at night. He came home drunk; and was a total ass about it. When he finally did start helping; he ended up passing out on the couch anyway so I couldn't do anything at all.

I couldn't have enjoyed more when my brother continues to eat the food that I buy and make.  His laziness to cook and consideration of others; like buying food that other people can eat; is something to aspire to.  I enjoy buying food only to have it eaten; and never returned; nor offered food when he buys it. It's the best.
